text: Nocardioides furvisabuli is a Gram-positive and rod-shaped bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from black beach sand from the Samyang Beach on the Jeju Island in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides furvisabuli at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase furvisabuli Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardioides furvisabuli
